title: How Many Calories in 10 Grapes?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in 10 grapes, including carbs, sugars, fiber, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per grape for easy tracking.
assumptions: Seedless red grapes, average size (~5 g each), fresh, with skin.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grape variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 10 grapes offer about 35 kcal, mainly from natural sugars with some fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one grape?
faqs.a: About 3.5 kcal per average seedless red grape.
Yes, 10 grapes have ~8 g natural sugars, but also 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do grapes have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very littleâ€”~1 g protein and 0 g fat in 10 grapes.

faqs.q: How do grape varieties affect calories?
faqs.a: Red and green are similar (~3-4 kcal each); larger or sweeter types may add 1-2 kcal per grape.
Modest at 0.1 g per grape; 10 provide 1 g, aiding digestion.
